docs.abstract: In my colleague Larry Altman's expert analysis of the presidential candidates' health, Barack Obama's doctor reports that Mr. Obama has switched from cigarettes to Nicorettes "with success." As Larry notes, it's not clear what "success" means, since Mr. Obama has also been bumming the occasional cigarette during the campaign, so there may be risk of [...]
docs.lead_paragraph: In my colleague Larry Altman's expert analysis of the presidential candidates' health, Barack Obama's doctor reports that Mr. Obama has switched from cigarettes to Nicorettes "with success." As Larry notes, it's not clear what "success" means, since Mr. Obama has also been bumming the occasional cigarette during the campaign, so there may be risk of him going back to his former smoking habits.

headline.print_headline: Many Holes in Disclosure of Nominees’ Health
headline.main: Many Holes in Disclosure of Nominees’ Health

docs.lead_paragraph: The limited information provided by the candidates is a departure from recent, more forthcoming, campaigns.
